name: Evergreen Internship
text: I just want to say how all around wonderful the service is, the staff and all their personable conversations. ( that give you those small hometown feels), and the effortless online ordering process... : ))  I've been to other Blackjacks.... ‚Ä¶More

name: Cheryl Lee
text: Stopped by to pick up an order about 20 minutes before 7:00p on a Monday. I was there early and boy was I impressed. ‚Ä¶More

name: sam lafton
text:
Good prices and good service.
Jalapeno poppers are hot
Wings weren't great.. Soggy skin

name: Jeffery Neal
text: Sorry to say this, but you guys have gone downhill. Your toppings are comparable to frozen pizza, and who serves reheated fried chicken soggy from the breading soaking in hot sauce as wings...gross! You just lost a customer that has followed you since 1986!

name: Honey Bunny
text: The pizza üçï is really so good.

name: Tickle Fingers
text: Not only is Black Jack pizza one of the best places to get pizza, but the staff at this location is very nice and they do a great job. Always happy to order from this location.

name: Jonnie Wine
text: üëå since moving to Colorado a year ago, best pizza üçï spot yet ü§òannddd they deliver! No other pizza  joint will deliver to my house just over 470 at bowelsüòñ must be a sign

name: Bree Pfaff
text:
They ALWAYS go above and beyond. Customer service, delivery times, and the food are absolutely amazing every time.
My order has become very strange since I can no longer eat dairy (and pizza is ‚Ä¶More

name: Joe Joe
text: I've had pizza here many times and almost always would rate it 5 stars.  But last time the pizza came with no tomato sauce, I felt really disappointed.  I guess nobody can be perfect.

name: Rob House
text: First time at blackjack....I was impressed..good stuffüëç

name: Luke Stevens
text: I accidentally messed up my online order so I called and they dealt with it, everything was great and always is. Their wings are great if you like spicy food like I do because they have some heat!

name: Dorothy Newton
text: The best pizza and crusts in the area!  The sauces are delicious and savory.

name: Jay M
text: Just got a super greasy pizza that fell apart when I tried to eat it. Thanks, glad I left a tip too!üôÑü§î wont be back soon.

name: MT G
text: So I bought 2 medium pizzas, which are very small, $24.00 for both? Wow what a rip off. You guys must enjoy ripping off your customers. I will never buy pizza from here again for that price. I suggest you guys fix your prices.

name: Alyssa Comstock
text: The pizza came a half an hour earlier than it was predicted to, and tasted absolutely delicious. It was probably the best pizza place I have had since moving here last May. 10/10 would recommend.

name: Rodolfo Del Rio
text: Best pizza in Denver

name: John Miller
text: Other joints should take a lesson from this place. Or a lesson from Mike. Especially here in CO because passion for food and restaurant management is lacking. Not here! ‚Ä¶More

name: Alex Escobar
text: Eric and Dylan were really nice, had a chat to them and they seemed like great employees. Anyways, the pizza was great as well. Tell them they made it well

name: Jessica J
text: Delivery is always quick and it is SO GOOD. I've ordered the past 2 friday nights and I'm hooked. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jo White
text: Mike is awesome! I make a special request  every place we order from (half no cheese no meat, the other half extra meat extra cheese) and it‚Äôs usually a problem but Mike handles my order perfect every-time. I highly recommend this particular Blackjack! I can say enough how awesome Mike is!

name: Lisa Rosales
text: Pizza was great, but the store was dirty.

name: Karen Marsh
text: Excellent customer service! Mike always goes out of his way to make sure every customer is always taken care of!  The whole staff is pretty darn awesome as well.  Number one thing about this black jack is the cleanliness, the employees are ‚Ä¶More

name: Kristen Galassi
text: By far they have the BEST pizza around. We have never had issues with our order, the quality is always consistent and when our pizza arrives it's always HOT!

name: Beth Boen
text: Super disappointing pizza. We had a party Saturday and ordered three large pizzas (2 cheese and one pepperoni) to be delivered at 6 p.m. The delivery occurred at 6 pm, but I wonder how long these pizzas had been left cooking or staying warm ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Caravan
text: Black jack does a great job. Good, quality pizza at a reasonable price. The staff is friendly and refreshingly competent. Toppings seem fresh and pizzas are produced with a measure care I find lacking more prolific chain stores. Can make a "well done" pizza without burning it. Hand tossed dough is excellent.

name: Tony Cole
text: Honestly, I wanted to like this place. Unfortunately, they messed up my order. But hey, I'm an understanding guy. The delivery driver was friendly and took about as long as was anticipated, so no issues there. However, they didn't get my ‚Ä¶More

name: BE WELL BE BLESSED.
text: PIZZA IN A JIFF & PRETTY GOOD, TOO.  THERE IS A DISCOUNT ON WALK IN PICK-UPS.

name: Eric Davidson
text: We live nowhere near this store but they deliver to us for some reason. Best Blackjack there is hands down.

name: Derrick From Littleton
text: Order the deep dish or squared pizza and it was the best I've had in a long time.  I always do carryout and the guys there are great!  Always leave them a tip

name: Scott Johnson
text: Great Za! Quick pick up times!

name: Mindy Mulay
text: Consistently very good. They're typically our go to for pizza delivery. Only had one negative experience with them throughout all the years we've ordered (super delayed delivery even though pre-scheduled online) but they made up for it. ‚Ä¶More

name: Tabu 03
text: Pizza and breadsticks were fresh and delicious! The guy who took my order was friendly (extra points for playing some msi and white zombie). Very fast service as well.

name: jim jim
text: My all time go to. Tried all the rest, this stores the best. Loyalty is a two way street

name: Robert Kirkham
text: The staff at this location is fantastic! I have never been treated with such enthusiasm and respect. The manager has so much energy. The pizza was fresh, and the salads are amazing! I will probably not purchase pizza anywhere else. ‚Ä¶More

name: Aurrick Ferrant
text:
This location of well run. Better prices than some pizza chains.
There are tables inside and a Pac-man arcade game. Dinning-in reminds me of the old style pizza parlors of the 80's

name: Andre Martinez
text: Good pizza for a value price. their salads and wings are good as well. I take their food over pizza hut papa Juan's and dominoes

name: Scot Verbs
text: Always happy service and consistently good pizza. Never disappoint.

name: Scott Sahling
text: We had a pretty big order, so when the online system said 20 min for pick up on a Friday night I was skeptical that it would be ready.  I walked in right at 20 minutes and they were cutting our pies!  Awesome!  Hot, fresh, excellent pizza and a great value. Well played Blackjack, well played!!

name: Loray Hayes Trusty
text: Great like always

name: Danelle Bartel
text: Had to make a change to an order and their manager Michael was great.  I order from here often and they always have good food especially their salads.  Top notch team here thanks

name: Missy Weglarz
text: Came here cause it is the company eric harris and dylan klebold worked for in the 90s. Yeah the pizza was whatever and the wings were trash. Staff was kinda weird but they played A Perfect Circle so i had to give them a tip.

name: Aaron Young
text: Blackjack is great! Lowest prices around, great pizza and wings that don't taste like synthetic ingredients. They always have your order ready quick. The manager Micheal is awesome and always makes sure you're satisfied with your food.

name: Katie Johnson
text: One word. Amazing. Boom.

name: Derek Dalley
text: There were a few issues I had, and one thing I want to point out was the, "oh sorry, our driver doesn't have a phone" answer when my pizza was an hour late. Not a hour total. A hour late.

name: Sharon Johnson
text: It was late but the driver and Mike (manager) made everything right.  Will always order from this location for work. Thanks

name: Brian
text: Just ordered a large thin crust, wings and cheese bread. Let me tell you, we will absolutely be back. Pizza was crispy, wings weren't those tiny ones you get from most places and the cheese bread was spot on. All for a good price. Keep up ‚Ä¶More

name: Malorie Oldham
text: Always fast, friendly service, good prices and super yummy food!  We've had appetizers, salads and pizza so far and they've all been great, looking forward to trying the calzones! AND, they are excellent with our son, who loves to come and cash in his dollars for quarters so that he can play the video games there ‚ò∫

name: Jessica Sanchez
text: I have to say.... we were Pizza Hut people for a long time. (Not my choice but the family liked it) The Pizza Hut near us stunk. Pizza got worse and worse. So I tried Black Jack. Pizza was 10 times better and the carry out deals can't be ‚Ä¶More

name: Christine Peterson
text: Always good pizza and salad

name: RayAnn Luera
text: Great 1st experience at Black Jack. Kids enjoyed the pizza, we enjoyed the salad.  Service was very friendly and positive. Thanks

name: Jake Erickson
text: Clobbers the chains with a swift kick to the groin

name: Matthew Ullrich
text: The square is pretty good for a chain restaurant

name: Landon Feddersen
text: THE BEST EVER!

name: Pingu James Penguin
text: Eric and Dylan were very nice, great customer service

name: Melissa Parascand
text:
Had the best customer service experience!

I made an online order, and likely ordered incorrectly. When I went to pick up ‚Ä¶More

name: NICK FRUTH
text: This place is phenomenal, great pies and mike is a real good dude. Fuchs & dotson, You guys are awesome.

name: Jason R
text: Their deep dish pizza is great. Highly recommend trying it.

name: Pete Stringfellow
text: Michael is the man! I just called in an order as a first time customer, the dude blew me away with his customer service. Excited to eat that pizza, nam nam nam!

name: Ken Pacheco
text: Great food good service.

name: Still Midwest Rapz
text: Always great pizza

name: cuezaireekaa
text:
These folks don't play around. They work crazy hard/fast, and you better bring your muscles.. Because they're hooking up the pie phat!
And they're fast when I get delivery..

name: Michael Riggs
text: Been coming here for years. Great pizza. Great employees. Keep up the great work guys!

name: Jeff Gottschalk
text: Of the chain places this is our favorite. The staff is awesome.

name: Allan Lawrence
text: Best consistent quality

name: John
text: Frozen pizza tastes better than what you get here. Wings are alright. If I could sum up my review in one word it would be 'meh'.

name: Drew F
text: Never late, food is always delicious. So happy we have a BlackJack nearby. We always order extra ranch for other meals. Out of town guests love it too. Great specials. Thanks guys!!

name: Robert Slavik
text: Lots of cheese and great sauce.

name: Robert Mcclellan
text: Pizzas always hot, salads always fresh. Mike and/or Mike are always friendly. They both know me name, which is why I keep coming back.

name: Amaan Haque
text: Prices are great; although pizza slightly resembles texture of cardboard but you're definitely getting what you pay for.

name: the_cycling_ appraiser
text: The pizza got here quick but it was the worst pizza I have ever had delivered. I order thin and crispy and this was anything but crispy. It was so undercooked that the dough was soft. GROSS!

name: jproccy
text: Did not complete my order correctly. Was really expecting a thin crust pizza with pepperoni and sausage with light cheese, and was extremely disappointed with the outcome. Normally enjoy Blackjacks... when they get my order right.

name: Complaints Department
text:
Mike D is a great pirate, he deserves a raise.

Oh, and he makes a damn good pizza.

name: Jody Colhouer
text: Pizza's are great and the best staff!!!

name: Austin Harris
text: Awesome staff. Better than any of the other franchised pizza places around. Go with these guys for your next pizza night!

name: Brad Anderson
text: Friendly service, good prices, and great pizza.

name: dwight young
text: Took over a hour  and 15 minutes. No call nothing. Horrible.place to order from

name: Jennifer
text: Great value and excellent taste. They never skimp on toppings and the pizza is always hot and fresh! Also very fast delivery times.

name: kaa
text: Never had one never was there Google what are you doing

name: Jason Parr
text: Love the square pizza! Reminiscent of the old little ceasers style but tastes way better.

name: Shandel Renstrom
text: I love blackjack pizza but I had a terrible experience with a delivery order placed at the federal location. They canceled my oder 20 min before it was supposed to be delivered to a local brewery when I ordered it that morning online. When ‚Ä¶More

name: Denver TV Repair
text: Excellent pizza, good selection of toppings and styles plus terrific wings and salads. Good prices!

name: JOHN DELUE
text: Great pizza, lots of toppings. Best delivery in South Jeffco

name: Who da! What tha!
text: Foods always good and arrives quick!

name: CBA Ken Caryl
text: BEST PIZZA  AND SERVICE IN LITTLETON WILL NOT GO ANY WERE ELSE MIKE D AND KEVIN ARE AWESOME

name: Mike D
text: Just had a great experience with the girl that took my order for delivery!! Thanks again! I hope corporate see's this. I wish I got her name, but it just ordered 2 mins ago. A+ Customers service.

name: Sarah Baker
text: Fast and friendly! Great salads and pizza!

name: Rhonda Jacobson
text: First time I've had the pizza.  I personally did not care for it. Wasn't "gross" but would not order again. Staff was nice, order was accurate.

name: Shane Apple
text: Nice pizza shop man very friendly staff i made friends with 2 young boys who worked there, trying to think of they're names... oh yes eric and dylan quite nice and helpfull

name: Michael
text: Great quality and great price! Whenever we want pizza we either make it at home fresh or go to this blackjack!

name: James Nelson
text: Terrible customer service. The people there were super rude and when there was an issue they were demeaning and condescending. I will never give them another dollar and I recommend that you don't either.

name: Lisa Parkhurst
text: The Good Deal is the best pizza I've had. The veggies are so fresh and the taste is amazing.

name: Adam
text: Good pizza. Yet I have been told many frequent this store to see where Eric Harris and Dylan Klebold worked.

name: TJM PROMOTIONS
text: The Best blackjack pizza I have tasted.. the pizza was fresh and made to perfection. I will be back !!!!!

name: Andrea Bennett
text: Best. Pizza. Ever. Omg so delish! I have been a loyal pizza hut fan for years. I'm also from Illinois where pequods and Giordano's are big names. But THIS! This pizza is why people should move to Colorado!

name: john S
text: I have NEVER had a bad experience at this Blackjack. Order is always correct,  friendly service how can you go wrong!

name: Holly Randazzo
text: Great pizza! Awesome folks!
